twitch_info.title: Highlight: 259+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: I just remembered I wanted to ask you, when are you going to do sharkpuppet area?
it took me less than 1 min
yeah, but for completion's sake might as well record it right?
i remember i was furious about my ao stage play
so i decided to play shark puppet to calm myself down
yeah, I just think it would be nice to have the entire game on video
or else... another 20 hours of grind? Kappa
never knew how to do it
you have to spam right arrow key on ao stage screen
then the game will unlock it
thought it might have been something like that
i was pretty surprised because i unlocked it randomly without knowing about this avoidance existence
ok ill record it after all 5 avoidances clear
to have this avoidance as well
in my battlegrounds playlist/video in the future
your're going to combine it all into one video after all?
will it be a playlist or a video compilation
yeah, max and razzor did both
there are some pros and cons to both
as separate videos, they would probably get more views, if you cared about that
well i assume it would be pretty cool idea to make a video and playlist both
but obviously they could go together as a single video because they're the same game
I think if you make a single video you might as well have a playlist as well
i have separate videos on my channel already
but I personally would not feel like making the video
yeah, it is kind of redundant to have both
so i will make a video and put all avoidances there with adding my short opinion about each of them
razzor unlisted his individual videos after making the big video
not really sure that unlisting them is a good idea though
it will me my biggest accomplishment
the biggest one, except for that one which is bigger LUL
I think only about 6 people have done bg 100% though, it's interesting
i recently found an avoidance ill definitely play after bg 100%
i wanna take the curtain call
yeah, I know it. the only person who has played a decent amount of it is mir as far as I know
one of my most favorite songs
a shame, since it's very elaborate
you're a real T pazolite fan huh
I do not know why so few people want to play it
i wonder why this avoidance isn't in hof
it's not in HoF because it is uncleared
if you post it I will
you mean leave a link here?
lorema2SMOREc haha noob thinks he's a sword
but everything else is unbelievably good
it's nice that he reuploaded most of his videos at least
anyways, max probably just has other things to do right now
If he thinks it's hard enough, which it is, then he'll add it eventually
I guess I'll ask him about it right now
wonder what place will it have in hof
well dlfma is far from a bad player
it is probably because of pattern learning
yeah, it's probably somewhere around crack the candy difficulty
he took 60 hours on sciurus and that got placed around there
what's an average time of sciurus grind though
keep in mind his playthrough was blind though
take the curtain call is blind as well
because there were no clears before
the original crack the candy also has a practice tool, but this one does not
and this attracts me even more
i will probably have to find a way how to learn patterns faster
LUL , good luck, you'll never get me to play anything above 50 difficulty blind
it is not blind already because of dlfma
well, without a practice tool also
even with a video it would just be torture for me
so ill at least have a concept
yeah, you can just copy dlfma's strats
yeah, I doubt he knows who I am
oh, yes, I wrote back just now
how did you know he wrote me?
you're definitely trolling me, he didn't respond
well you wrote him and it would be a reasonable thought that he responded
you know what's else about my intuition
i called k3 rng crystal on my friend stream
i called x50 streak loss on cyber attack on my friend's stream
rng crystal is a bit more i guess
I could probably do full speed if I were more awake
you made through a wall at least
the higher the speed, the larger than difference too
I will do attempts when I am actually ready
and when I clear no one will care because they are sick of DS
but I will clear much more quickly than If I started attempts right now
also, I will be more prepared for what I tackle next
it is quite a good feeling that the first getting into hof happened by ds clear
when all 13 clears are by enough famous people
who got to fangame community in aug 2021
well, justdont is also rather obscure
but he had at least done ao stage
and then you waltz in and beat DS
is the date i met with my friends with common interests
70hr DS clear in 4 months of total fangame playtime seems impressive
i started playing it in March 2021
so that's a bit more time of grind
i thought getting into fangame community meant when you 1st started playing
yeah, not everyone who plays is in the community
i got to play fangames in late 2020
and basically all my clears to the moment are k2 k3 nang and ds
fish is basically the only notable thing on it
and couple of average difficulty avoidances
@ubur real fangamer on the stream, finally
they are mostly like avoidance fsr
me and algo are hardworking grinders i guess Kappa
my longest grind to the moment is 72 hrs
ao stage took my personal grind time record
but you are now a member of the aa
not sure if that's good or bad
can't even remember who made it
i guess it is not worth it
that @ubur isn't satisfied about his grind
unless he beat it like 3 months ago
if casual didnt beat this means im best avoidance player na
pretty sure casual is the best avoidance player world
pog im best avoidance player world now
I like how he is really relaxed about it
he doesn't brag about it at all
he just beats hard stuff and pops off
like i guess he got more phase 5 attempts than ao
but he got them much faster
anyways, you can just watch him play last tis 1.25 or something and see he's just the best
well ill not make a mistake if i say he's the best avoidance player in western community
he just has more reading skill than anyone else
well in the western community there is not nearly as much competition
I think that the top 5 players aside from casual are all eastern
it's probably something like ao sinkun pyun zero ...
eastern community includes some titans as ao, zero, sinkun
and after that it's harder to say
icesalt fish and dlfma are both really good
me i beat join the aa
zero is overall unbelievably good both in needle and avoidance
but ubur, you're western, so you aren't on that list right?
ubur goes into top 5 best avoidance players surely
@xoryla yeah, zero is the best overall player, when you weight everything equally
the list was top 5 om general but you were just naming easterners
zero also plays a metric fuckton of absolute garbage game though, so he deserves it
oh, my top players list overall is casualcrap, followed by all those easterners
zero got gureiga stage in 40 minutes!!!
he learned a hard pattern, made a good consistency in each attack
and I can't beat it in 13 hours at the moment
he has very good fangame intuition
@xoryla once you have 5k clears you will be able to as well
if i clear 5k fangames below 30 difficulty will it mean ill manage to pass 95+ avoidances in 30 minutes? LUL
80% of them are basically worthless though
but seriously, if the top avoidance players stopped quitting, they too would be able to do stuff like that
but pyun, afoth, zero, etc, none of these people play a lot of avoidance anymore
one of the reasons ao is so good is because he is one of the few who has stuck with it
probably because they have cleared all fun avoidances already
I think that it's nice to continue getting good, so that when someone does release a fun avoidance, you are prepared
which has presented in fangame awards 2021
did the other collab even get released?
I can't even remember receiving collabs 4 and 5
idk i don't know any information about these games
i forgot the exact number i guess
but what i know is that it will definitely be a magnificent game
one of the notable things about it to me is that it contains redire's most recent work
like i heard what developers said about it
they said the release happens in couple of weeks
I doubt I will ever play much of it, but it will be cool to try it out
well, we both have other things to occupy us right now anyways
but yeah, I was expecting it sooner
but on the other hand it is a good thing because there are no distractions during my bg 100% grind
only, as i said, take the curtain call
but im planning to play it afterwards
it was an unfinished work for ages
600 hours of a hard work and basically no one is playing it now
it is possible if more people clear it it will get more exposure
also, it being on the Ho
but there are games that just get buried
went uncleared for years until bakudanchan beat it
is it hof I don't know about
it has to be in hof i believe
really want to see what place will it take
of course, since he hasn't beaten it, it's just his guess
stuff tends to move around after max beats it
now i feel a bit better for adam that his game will be more recognizable
that his clear will see people
yes, only time will tell if it becomes more popular, but there is hope
I really wonder when someone will make a high production value avoidance that is harder than mayumushi
ao has been the one pushing the genre forward but he is done making games now
someone else must take up the torch
not the same as galaxy collapse where there are just bunch of attacks to read
I wish razzor would do it, but he doesn't have the confidence in himself right now
yes, galaxy collapse is too generic to be high production value
it's just not really what I had in mind
the problem is the audience for those games is so small
why would anyone put in the effort when like 5 people at most will play?
would be cool to see what avoidance will take a place from mayu
it's also because it is hard to balance stuff unless you are a top player yourself
so really the pool of potential makers is small
but redire doesn't make much stuff, even though everything he puts out is just a masterpiece
red is busy playing ds, don't distract him :p
he is doing pretty good actually
he's beaten stuff that is almost as hard
definitely better than me during my grind
k3 ex emperor is apparently only marginally easier
the difference is that ex emp was cleared with practice tool using
I do not expect him to use practice tools
he said that he wants to beat it without them
he said he was using practice tool in ao stage
he actually makes a lot of practice tools for everything else
he is a hater of patterns as well
he goes into our club BloodTrail
I don't really know why he wants ds clear to be without practice tools
he felt bad for me when i said i was learning ao pattern shit without any tool
because there are no hard patterns
and he's doing actually pretty good without any
but it must also be because the clear will be more meaningful to him, I think
but this makes me wonder if he would go back to using practice tools if he played anything harder
but there's no actual matter if practice tool was used or not
who came to see the clear
yeah, I think that practice tool or no practice tool, a clear is a clear
unless they are from eastern community
he will definitely use practice if he starts mayu grind!!
like as i said he practiced ao stage patterns
and mayu patterns are significantly harder i guess
I wonder if he will do that
he could also go back to k3, but he has both wr at the moment
and k3 100% seems too far out of reach
if someone took his record he would probably go back though
yeah, I think it is because it would give him competition to make things more interesting, not that he cares about having the wr
you know he started regularly streams recently
and he was touching k3 speedrun topics
bad thing i forgot what exactly he said about that
too bad, I can't understand the russian
if he ever says anything important, like "I'm playing mayumushi after ds" or something, just tell me
you can write him in the chat in english and he will immediately switch to eng mode ;)
but I am not awake when he is streaming either LUL
yeah, I am a night owl, so I can't catch that LUL
every time i see you discord acc
I don't know how it determines that
but our schedules probably do not line up
discord is a smart program i see
anyways, you are free to message me at any time, as you have done
but of course, I take a while to respond
actually you were chatting with me in ds when there was 2 pm in my country
it was 6 am in your place
yeah, my sleep schedule is absurd
I went to sleep at about 8 am today
but I woke up for lunch at 12
today i was chatting with my friend until 3:30 am
and i had to wake up in 7
you have joined the dark side with me
today i got my own antirecord
it is painful to get so little sleep, you have my condolences
anyways, so that you can hopefully get more sleep, I am wrapping up for today
we've had a nice chat indeed!
it was because I was not paying attention
I promise you I was killing it this morning
